fields.fieldDescription: The Record ID (RID) that uniquely identifies this facility sublimit.
The Record ID (RID) of the facility.
The expiry date of the facility sublimit.
The final maturity date of the facility sublimit.
The effective date of the facility sublimit.
The name of the facility sublimit.
Timestamp from when this row was created.
Timestamp from when this row was last updated.
User ID that created this row.  This is a foreign key to VLS_USER_PROFILE.UPT_UID_USERID.
User ID that last updated this row.  This is a foreign key to VLS_USER_PROFILE.UPT_UID_USERID.
The current global amount of this facility sublimit.

When a site is licensed for 'Available Branch and Organization Code', a servicing group in a different branch from the facility owning branch can be assigned All host SG and portfolio shares take on the branch and servicing group take on for outstandings subsequently booked under this sublimit where the outstanding uses the commitment shares as its base shares.

Used to map the Org Code at sites licensed for 'Available Branch and Organization Code'.  If not assigned on the sublimit directly, the assigned value on the facility, if any is returned by the object
Currency assigned to a sublimit which can be different than the facility currency. Must be a currency defined on the restrictions page or the facility currency.
